attributes.additional_details: I, the undersigned believe that the re-introduction of National Service would be an essential Crime Prevention plan from a social perspective in light of the recent rioting, looting, thuggary and complete disregard for the law displayed by those young people around the country. Only applicable to those who do not engage in education and the opportunities available to them. I call on the Government to honour its commitment in protecting the honest and law abiding citizens.
